mage jiwithaye hama hinawakama patanganma une umbaa.ee jiwithe hina kiyala deyak dakkanam ee hama hinekama umbaath math ekka hitiya.kath kawuruwath nohitapu mata umbae aadare mahamerak wune matath nodanimayi.ee loke hamadamathma rajina uneth oyamayi.mama mawa amathakakarala umbaata karapu aadare me tharam baldu wenawa kiyala dannawanam oya jiwitheta kawadawathma lan nowi inna thibuna mata.me hama dukakma mechchara kittuwuna nisane.mama dannawa issarawage thurulwela ange gawi gawi inna dan apita ba kiyala.eeth mage jiwithetath wada aadare karapu oyage oya chuti agili mage agiliwalin allagannawath dan mata barinam mama thawath methanata wela inna eke theruma mokadda?kisima waraddak wenna denne nathuwa balagaththu oyage jiwitheta mama pita kenek wunata passe mama thawath methanata wela inna eke therumak thiyanawada?wate pite kawuru hitiyath kohe hari idan duwagana awith mage athe ellila girawek wage thorathonchiyak nathiwa kiyawagana yana oya awurudu dekakata passe me widihata ahamben hambunahama aduranne nathi kenek wage idagana pala nokiya pala bedana kota mama thawath methanata wela inna hitha hadaganne kohomada?me jiwithe hinayak.siddawuna,siddawena hama deyakma hinayak.ee jiwithe hinayak nowanne hamuwimath wenwimath witharamayi sudu.ee habawa mata pennala ee hinen mawa aharewuweth oyamayi.kisima hinayak nodakka polawe payagahala hitapu mage loke sampurnayenma hinayak karala ada me widihata kakulen adala aapahu haba loketa wisikarala danna tharam oyata thibuna ayithiya mokadda?oya mage gawa nathi wunath,oya suwanda mage gawa nathiwunath mama ee hinaloke jiwathwune hari sathutin.ee athitheta mama godak aadarekala.ee athithe mawa jiwathkala.mata husmaganna hethuwak thibunanam ee ape athithe gana mage hithe radila thibuna mathake witharamayi.eeth adin passe mama mata husmaganna aluth hethuwak hoyaganna oone bawa umbaa mata therumkarala dunna.mama yanawa sudu.aapahu oyawa asdeken nodakinna,oya katahanda aapahu noasenna tharam durakata mama yanawa.kawadawathma mage loketa aapahu enna epa oya,hinenwath.
